DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study Assess Efficacy Safety SK-MS10 subject With acute chronic gastritis .
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Efficacy Safety SK-MS10 Subjects With Acute Chronic Gastritis
DOC.criteria: 1 . Have diagnose erosive gastritis endoscopy within 1 week enrollment . 2 . Patients voluntarily sign write informed consent may participate study . 1 . Pregnant lactate female . 2 . Patients gastric ulcer , duodenal ulcer GERD . 3 . Use proton pump inhibitor , H2receptor antagonist , muscarine receptor antagonist gastrin receptor antagonist within 2 week initiate study drug therapy 4 . Patients require corticosteroid therapy 5 . Severe neurological psychological disease 6 . History allergic reaction medication use study 7 . Use investigational drug within 30 day prior study . 8 . Patients investigator consider ineligible study
